crisises.desc: The healer is on a business trip, and the supermayor of %villageName% hurt his knee. Find %item1% to heal it.
The supermayour has a new hobby. Get him %item1% and %item2% and try not to think what he does with them.

The fields produced no crop this season, and starvation threatens %villageName%. The villagers can be fed with %item1%, but you need %item2% for the sick, and %item3% to satisfy the needs of the rich.
A rich uberbaron is coming to visit %villageName%, and the supermayour feels like earning a few extra bucks. Find %item1%, %item2%, %item3% and %item4% to sell.
The sheep god demands sacrifices! He/She wants %item1%, %item2% and also maybe probably %item3%, and quickly!
A flood is about to rise, and the only way to prevent is is to fortify the walls with %item1%, divert water with %item2% and keep %item3% ready for the worst case.
